ext.description: Browse, search, pin, promote (copy to today), and delete local Codex CLI session history stored under ~/.codex/sessions.
viewContainer.title: Codex History
cfg.title: Codex History Viewer
cfg.sessionsRoot: Root folder of Codex sessions. Leave empty to use the default (~/.codex/sessions).
cfg.previewOpenOnSelection: Open a session preview when selecting an item in the tree.
cfg.previewMaxMessages: Max number of user/assistant messages to include in tooltips and quick previews.
cfg.searchMaxResults: Max number of search hits to collect.
cfg.deleteUseTrash: When deleting, move files to the OS trash/recycle bin (recommended).
cfg.uiLanguage: UI language for this extension. Use 'auto' to follow VS Code's display language.
cfg.uiAlwaysShowHeaderActions: Always show view header action icons (sets VS Code setting 'workbench.view.alwaysShowHeaderActions').
